summary: Fixes the missing ears and gaping holes in the Dragonscale Helmets.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFA500][b][size=\"5\"]Khajiit Dragonscale Helmet Fix[/size][/b][/color]

Fixes the missing ears on the Dragonscale Helmets for cats both male and female. 

The only downside is earrings and ear extension thingies will vanish, but hey it\'s got to be better than two big holes right?

Not much else to say really.

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]My other mods[/b][/color][/size]

author: Gromit
